GULF OF GUINEA.
PIRACY.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-18N 005-11E AT 070727Z JUL.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 14 JUL 16.
